mapper.select: SELECT S.STU_NO , S.DEP_CD , S.STU_YR , S.STU_SEM , S.STU_NM , S.STU_NME , S.STU_TEL , S.STU_ZIP , S.STU_ADDR1 , S.STU_ADDR2 , S.STU_BANK_CD , S.STU_DEPO , S.STU_ACT , S.STU_PIC , S.STU_BIR , S.PRO_NO , E.EMP_NM FROM DEPARTMENT D, PROFESSOR P, EMPLOYEE E, STUDENT S WHERE D.DEP_CD = P.DEP_CD AND P.PRO_NO = E.EMP_NO AND P.PRO_NO = S.PRO_NO AND P.DEP_CD = #{depCd}

SELECT SH.SCLH_CD , SH.SCL_CD , SH.STU_NO , SH.SCLH_YR , SH.SCLH_SEM , SH.SCLH_DT , SH.SCLH_YN , SH.SCLH_PAY_YN , SH.PRO_NO , SH.SCLH_AMT , SH.SCLH_RCMD , (SELECT S.SCL_NM FROM SCHOLARSHIP S WHERE S.SCL_CD = SH.SCL_CD) SCL_NM , E.EMP_NM FROM EMPLOYEE E, PROFESSOR P, SCL_HISTORY SH WHERE E.EMP_NO = P.PRO_NO AND P.PRO_NO = SH.PRO_NO AND SH.SCLH_YN = 'AP001' AND SH.STU_NO = #{detailStu}
